caption: The city of Calgary & Southern Alberta has suffered extensive flooding this past week and the Scotiabank Saddledome has flooded. Water is sitting at row eight in the lower bowl and the event level has been deemed a total loss. Despite the tragedy, Calgarians and Albertans are banding together to help restore our great city and province. Restoration has not yet begun on the Dome but will when the water recedes. We have no doubt the city and province will be stronger than ever during the restoration process! #WeAreCalgary #yycflood #yyc
caption_raw: The city of Calgary & Southern Alberta has suffered extensive flooding this past week and the Scotiabank Saddledome has flooded. Water is sitting at row eight in the lower bowl and the event level has been deemed a total loss. Despite the tragedy, Calgarians and Albertans are banding together to help restore our great city and province. Restoration has not yet begun on the Dome but will when the water recedes. We have no doubt the city and province will be stronger than ever during the restoration process! #WeAreCalgary #yycflood #yyc
